text: Kalyana Unnikal is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Jagathy Sreekumar and starring Mahesh and Baiju in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/kalyana-unnikal-malayalam-movie/ The film currently has a rating of 4.8 out of 10 on IMDb. ==Cast== * Baiju as Mammunny * Mahesh as Krishnanunny * Sukumari as Maggy * Innocent as Anthrayose * Kalpana as Lucie * Prem Kumar as Bosco * Rajan P Dev as Muthu Nayakam / Jolly Mathew * Sathaar as Police Officer * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Kuttappi * Maathu as Sugandhi * Mala Aravindan as Cleopatra Nanappan * Mamukkoya as Al Khobar Anthruman * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Pushkaran Pillai * Shanthi Krishna as Raziya * Jose Pellissery as Parakkal Avarachan * Karamana Janardanan Nair as Musakutty Musaliyar * Bobby Kottarakkara * Indrans * Jagannadhan * Beena Antony * Shivaji * Sagar Shiyas * Santhakumari * Kunjandi * Ravi Vallathol ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kalyana Unnikal
